exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce chain to an evaluable reference.

In environment X : forall T : poset, Pred T -> Prop S1, S2, T1, T2 : poset f1 : S1 -> T1 f2 : S2 -> T2 M1 : monotone f1 M2 : monotone f2 s : chain [posetofS1 * S2] pred_s : Pred [posetofS1 * S2] s_axiom : chain_axiom pred_s Unable to unify "monotone f2" with "[snd^^[f1 \\* f2^^Chain s_axiombyprod_mono M1 M2]byproj2_mono] = [f2^^[snd^^Chain s_axiombyproj2_mono]byM2]".

original: unfold prod_chain. unfold proj2_chain. unfold chain, chain_axiom in s. destruct s as [pred_s s_axiom]. simpl. apply M2.
